headline: Racist company
cons: Refuses to hire Chinese employees although the turnover rate at our Duluth location needs teller

headline: Best Work Environment
pros: Very well maintained, well managed and energetic team
cons: No direct communication available for hr needs

headline: Stable Company With Few Growth Opportunities
pros: This is a stable company with great benefits. Employees are given many chances to correct mistakes.
cons: The culture can be difficult to get used to if you don't speak Korean. Also, there are limited growth opportunities and career advancement.

headline: Loan Officer
pros: The loan staff is friendly and very helpful. The staff helps train you from day 1 and you can always ask your advisor any question.
cons: The upper-management is in a serious office politics game. They don't get along well and this in turn affect different branches/departments working together.
